ACCIÓN | PARTICIPACIÓN ACCIONARIA | NÚMERO DE ACCIONES DORA MATILDE TREJOS PUERTA, C.C. 31.953.854 | 50.000 | 50% | 7.042 JUAN CARLOS ESCOBAR WELSCH, C.C. 16.733.280 | 50.000 | 50% | 7.042 TOTAL | | | 14.084 2°.) Este certificado se expide por solicitud expresa del señor JUAN CARLOS ESCOBAR WELSCH, representante Legal de MEGASERVICIOS INGENIERÍA S.A.S., NIT: 805.031.602 – 7, para trámites legales, comerciales y/o bancarios. Para constancia de los anterior, se firma en la ciudad de Cali, a los veintitrés (23) días del mes de septiembre de dos mil veinte (2020). JULIO CÉSAR SUAZA Revisor Fiscal T.P. ACCIÓN column - PARTICIPACIÓN ACCIONARIA column - NÚMERO DE ACCIONES column - DORA MATILDE TREJOS PUERTA, C.C. 31.953.854: 50.000 value, 50% participation, 7.042 shares - JUAN CARLOS ESCOBAR WELSCH, C.C. 16.733.280: 50.000 value, 50% participation, 7.042 shares - TOTAL: 14.084 shares - Certificate issued at request of JUAN CARLOS ESCOBAR WELSCH, legal representative - Date: September 23, 2020, in Cali - Signature of Julio César Suaza, Revisor Fiscal, T.P. No. 9881 – T ## 2. PRIORITY CHECKS - Not BLANK - contains meaningful content - Not LINK_ONLY - no hyperlinks/URLs directing elsewhere ## 3. ISSUER IDENTIFICATION I confirm this is a corporate document issued by a certified public accountant for a specific company. The document provides detailed ownership information for MEGASERVICIOS DE INGENIERÍA S.A.S., verifying its corporate structure and shareholding composition. ## 4. DOCUMENT FUNCTION ANALYSIS The certificate serves to officially document the company's ownership details, showing an equal 50-50 split between two shareholders with precise financial and share information. ## 5. CATEGORY CLASSIFICATION I'll systematically evaluate the document's characteristics to determine its precise classification. **CECRL**: Corporate ownership document, not a personal identification record. **RUT**: Not a tax registration form from DIAN. **CERL**: Not an official Chamber of Commerce registration certificate. **ACC**: Perfect match - confirms shareholder details, ownership percentages, and capital contributions with specific share allocation. **RUB**: Not a beneficial ownership compliance document. Validation confirms ACC classification with precise ownership evidence, including names, percentages, and share distribution, meeting all key structural requirements for a corporate shareholding certification.
